runs.comm: gets it to bend back in sharply, Chandimal prods forward half-heartedly and is struck on the pad. Amir goes up in an appeal, but umpire Anil Chaudhary indicates the ball hit him high. Cracking start. Hawkeye confirms it would have missed the stumps
gets a thick inside edge to the inswinger
how did that miss the off stump, I don't know. Back of length delivery, lands just a touch outside off and holds its line, good leave in the end by Chandimal
struck on the pad but the ball was angling down leg. Once again, it nipped back in sharply from middle and leg
full and swinging back into middle and leg, strikes Dilshan on the pad as he looks to flick it past square leg, they pinch a leg-bye
juicy half-volley and put away without much fuss. Plants his front foot forward and crashes that into the gap between cover and mid-off
nips back in to hit Dilshan high on the thigh pad, the point fielder collects the deflection and has a shy at the stumps at the striker's end. They sneak an overthrow
back of length delivery slanting away, left alone
gets some lift off the deck from the back of length area on middle, he jabs off the glove towards point, they scamper through for a run
beauty! Pitching on off, moves away ever-so-slightly to square Dilshan up, didn't miss the edge by much. Excellent carry too
play and a miss. Threw his bat at that away going delivery, but was early into the stroke
pushed firmly to mid-off for a quick single
can't pierce that off side ring. Full and wide, driven but straight to cover point

gets an inside edge onto the pad as he looks to flay an inswinger over cover, luckily for him, it doesn't roll onto the stumps. For a second, Dilshan had no idea where the ball was as he looked to get across for a run
floats it full and on middle and off, tapped with soft hands to short cover
pulled, and pulled quite well. Off the front foot too! Picked the length early and rolled his wrists on that nicely to get it towards deep square leg. Fine leg had no chance
swung across the line, missed it. Predetermined again
dabbed with soft hands to the off side
eased towards point
length ball on middle and leg, turned to square leg
gets a thick edge that races away towards third man where Shoaib Malik runs around quickly to keep it down to a single

driven, but not off the middle, manages to steal a run even as the cover fielder fires a throw that misses the stumps at the bowler's end. A direct hit and Dilshan may have been in trouble. Nawaz the fielder in question
excellent bouncer on middle, he looks to ramp it over the keeper's head, but is beaten for pace
in the slot and he's thumped that into the cover boundary. Rare full ball and he has taken full toll of that
drifting into middle, driven wide of cover for an easy single
firm drive to long-off
on the shorter side, skids on from middle, Dilshan pushes outside the line, gets an inside edge onto the pad
Irfan makes a mess at short fine leg. Dilshan top-edges a slog sweep, he had to change directions, the arms and legs were everywhere as he turned back. Didn't look like taking it
gets a thick edge as he looks to crash that past cover, races away past short third man. That's adding insult to injury
nicely behind the line of the ball, as he bunts it to cover
didn't get hold of it, but there's enough to beat mid-on. Steps out and hits across the line, bat face turns but he manages to drill it past the infield
gets underneath the ball this time and lofts it over long-on. Clean strike that. Excellent use of the feet. It was flatter, but he ensured he got right towards the ball swiftly
that's been slapped past the bowler. The pressure's gone, and how. Hit really hard, the bowler had little time to react
steps out and drives it inside-out to cover
fired into middle and leg, Dilshan is cramped for room as he steps out to loft, squeezes it to cover
swept over square leg, it was drifting down leg and he got enough bat on it. Poor first over.
loopy delivery on middle, he gets forward and defends
tucked wide of square leg for an easy single
worked with the angle to deep square leg
pushed through quicker as he steps out, worked into the gap at deep midwicket, excellent running between the wickets
looks to cut, but is cramped for room, gets a thick inside edge
this one's a fast off-cutter, he mistimes a pull to deep midwicket
hit into the gap at deep point, waited for the late turn before having a crack at that
flatter one on off stump, he gets forward and crunches that into the wide long-off boundary. The fielder there dived full length across the turf, but only managed to parry it over
full toss on the pads, whipped to deep square
sharp turn away from middle, he's squared up as he looks to push it with soft hands
sweeps and misses, struck on the pad but the angle would have taken it down leg side
punched to cover
starts off with a pacy delivery on middle, played back to the bowler
arches back and ramps the short ball down towards third man, excellent effort by Sharjeel, throwing himself to his right to stop that one
gets it to bend back in a touch from middle, played with soft hands to the off side
worked towards short midwicket, the fielder there comes rushing in to prevent the single
mistimes an ugly hoick, straight to midwicket
squeezed towards deep point, it was slow and full on off stump
straight as a dye. Steps out and hammers it down the ground into the long-on boundary. Sharjeel was no more than 10 yards away from the ball, but it was drilled
steps out and turns it across the line to deep midwicket
short and wide, he makes room and crunches it to deep point
drawn forward as Afridi slows it down, defended to short cover
mistimes a lofted hit, just lands short of Sharjeel at long-on
mistimes a cut, rolls to the point fielder
excellent bouncer, Chandimal looks to walk across and scoop it over short fine, but is beaten for pace as he awkwardly looks to sway out of the way

top edges a pull that lands just short of the third man boundary. Once again, beaten for pace but luck is on his side. Wahab has an anguished look on his face, can't do much about that. Full marks for the effort. He's really bending his back here
slapped into the cover boundary at the rate of knots. Disdainfully done.  Backs away, uses the width and boom!
dabbed towards square leg for an easy single
pulled, but not entirely off the middle, the man at deep midwicket picked it up late, Afridi isn't happy with the effort, should have been just one
opened the bat face late to slice it behind point, superb stroke. Went hard at that one, but adjusted his stroke well to play it to the left of the point fielder to pick the gap
slides it down leg, the ball takes the pad and beats the keeper to the fine leg boundary. Sarfraz couldn't have done much there to be fair
steps out and works it across the line towards deep midwicket
swept fiercely, but straight to deep square leg
goes hard, but can't connect the cut
gets it into the gap at deep midwicket, good work there
hit hard to sweeper cover, Afridi has bowled out
hops back and whips it down to fine leg to bring up his 3rd T20I fifty. Punch in the air, acknowledges the applause of the dressing room
banged in short on middle, he pats it with soft hands to the off side and gets across for a quick single
beaten as he looks to back away and angle it wide of the point fielder
looks to scoop it over the keeper's head, hit high on the glove, lands short of Sarfraz
hit hard but an excellent stop by Afridi at cover saves three runs for the side
superbly done. Waits for the bounce, gets across, uses the pace and helps it into the fine leg boundary
steps out and hammers it into the sight screen. Didn't get to the pitch, but it didn't matter. Went through with the stroke and generated tremendous power as he hit through the line
flicked towards deep midwicket
quicker one on middle and leg, turned towards deep midwicket, excellent running
appeal for lbw as he misses the slog sweep, ball would have missed the fifth stump
misses the reverse sweep, the full toss finds a thin inside edge. Could have tonked it wherever he wanted
swung away into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket. Another expensive over

Wahab returns and strikes! Banged in short and angled outside off, Chandimal attempts the crudest of slogs and picks out midwicket. He hit that hard but straight into the lap of Sharjeel... Much like how Chandimal got out against UAE
back of a length on middle, guided towards point
full and angled in outside off, Dilshan looks to drive, but ends up skewering it towards mid-on
rising short ball outside off, the left-hander rises with it and rides it down to third man
Wahab generates extra bounce outside off, Dilshan is crease-bound as he throws his hands at it and misses
bouncer outside off with extra shoulder, trampolines off the surface, beating Dilshan's hook
fired into the pads from round the stumps, turned towards the man running in from deep midwicket
sweeps, misses as the ball deflects off the pad to short fine leg
lines himself up for a swipe across the line, but changes his mind, turned wide of midwicket
low full toss outside off, squeezed to cover, a misfield by Umar Akmal allows the single
looks to go down town but can only manage an inside edge onto the pad as he looks to to over long-on
as easy as they come. Looks to play the cross-batted slog over long-off, gets it low on the bat as Sharjeel positions himself nicely to take it with the ropes lurking behind him.
top edges a pull towards fine leg, 12th T20I fifty for him. Muted celebration
superbly done. Whips it off his hip to fine leg
swing and a miss. Looks to go over cover, late on the shot
slogged across the line off the inside edge, the deep square leg fielder Nawaz did well to run around and dive to stop it, but deflected it into the ropes as he tried to pull it back
right into the blockhole, turned to deep square
dabbed to third man
wicket first up in his second spell. Kapu looks to hit that to Chittagong, head falls over, in no position to play the lofted hit over long-on, misses as the ball hits middle of middle.
shapes to slap that over point, misses

slower one does the trick this time. Angled into middle from wide of the crease from round the stumps, he was through with the stroke even before the ball arrived, missed it only to see the LED bails flying over his head. Pakistan are scything their way into the middle order
angled down to Amir at third man
makes room and plays it towards point
didn't miss the off stump by much. Backed away to carve the full delivery over point, couldn't reach out in the end as he moved too far
reverse Dilscoop, can we call it? Changes his grip ever-so-late and then ramps it over short third man. Fearless. Takes some guts to do that off Amir
swung across the line towards deep midwicket, the fielder slips because of the dew
a mistimed pull, nearly went for four. Umar slides around at deep square leg to cut that off
sees him stepping out and bowls it full and wide, Dilshan couldn't reach out, but it was just outside the wide line

oh dear, oh dear. What has he done? Irfan has no clue where the ball went. Second miss. Dilshan top edges a slog that flies towards third man, where Irfan was back-pedalling as he tried to take the catch. But the moment he saw the ropes lurking round the corner, he tried to change tracks, but couldn't hold on.
low full toss outside off, squeezed to mid-off, Wahab switched off after sliding, batsmen aware to the possibility of the second
full toss on middle, swung across the line to square leg
swing and a miss. Length ball outside off, he was better off going over point than have a swipe over midwicket
this time he does exactly that. Makes room, uses the width to slap it over point, no chance for the third man fielder
has a big heave at that one, toe-ends it to midwicket
mistimes a loft over cover, Wahab runs to his right to stop that but doesn't aim at the striker's end fearing an overthrow
pulled, but straight to Iftikhar at deep midwicket
slower one outside off, he waits and waits and then thumps it into the gap at sweeper cover. Poor running, could have and should have tried coming back for the third
